Deity.short_description: Supreme or powerful divine being worshipped as creator or ruler of universe.

Demigod.short_description: Being of part divine and part human nature or descent.

Angel.short_description: Divine messenger and celestial being serving as intermediary between divine and human.

Archangel.short_description: Higher-ranking angel of greater power and importance in celestial hierarchy.

Seraph.short_description: Highest order of angels, associated with light, ardor, and purity.

Cherub.short_description: Angelic being associated with divine knowledge and cosmic harmony.

Spirit.short_description: Non-physical entity or essence, often associated with natural phenomena.

Ghost.short_description: Disembodied soul or spirit of deceased person manifesting to the living.

Demon.short_description: Malevolent supernatural being often associated with evil or darkness.

Djinn.short_description: Supernatural creature in Islamic mythology with free will, neither angel nor demon.

Elemental.short_description: Nature spirit embodying and controlling specific natural forces.

Avatar.short_description: Incarnation or embodiment of deity or divine force in physical form.

Bodhisattva.short_description: Enlightened being who delays nirvana to help others achieve enlightenment.

Deva.short_description: Divine being in Hindu tradition associated with natural forces and phenomena.

Asura.short_description: Power-seeking deity or titan, often in opposition to devas.

Ancestor Spirit.short_description: Spiritual essence of deceased forebear maintaining connection with living.

Guardian Spirit.short_description: Protective entity assigned to watch over person, place, or thing.

Nature Spirit.short_description: Being embodying natural features like trees, rivers, or mountains.

Celestial Being.short_description: Divine or heavenly entity residing in higher spiritual realms.

Immortal.short_description: Being not subject to death, often achieved through spiritual cultivation.

Fairy.short_description: Magical being of folklore, often associated with nature and elements.

Dragon.short_description: Mythical serpentine creature often representing primal or celestial forces.

Phoenix.short_description: Mythical bird cyclically reborn from own ashes, symbol of transformation.

Unicorn.short_description: Pure mystical being representing divine grace and spiritual power.

Familiar.short_description: Spirit taking animal form to assist practitioner of magic.

Thought-form.short_description: Entity created by focused mental or spiritual energy.

Tulpa.short_description: Being manifested through spiritual or mental concentration.

Egregore.short_description: Collective thought-form or psychic entity created by group consciousness.

Ascended Master.short_description: Being who has transcended physical existence through spiritual evolution.

Light Being.short_description: Entity composed of pure energy or light, often of higher vibration.

Archon.short_description: Powerful cosmic being influencing material reality and human consciousness.

Emanation.short_description: Manifestation or extension of divine source into lower realms.

Soul.short_description: Spiritual or immaterial essence of living being.

Higher Self.short_description: Transcendent aspect of individual consciousness connected to divine source.

Divine Messenger.short_description: Being tasked with delivering spiritual communications to humanity.

Totem.short_description: Spirit being serving as emblem of person, clan, or tribe.

Guide.short_description: Non-physical entity providing spiritual direction and wisdom.

Oversoul.short_description: Higher consciousness or divine aspect overseeing individual souls.

Collective Entity.short_description: Being formed from merged consciousness of multiple individuals.

Planetary Being.short_description: Conscious entity embodying entire planet or celestial body.

Cosmic Being.short_description: Entity operating on universal or multidimensional scale.

Elemental Lord.short_description: Powerful being ruling over specific element or natural force.

Ancient One.short_description: Primordial being existing since beginning of creation.

Watcher.short_description: Being observing and recording events without direct intervention.

Oracle.short_description: Entity channeling divine wisdom and prophetic knowledge.

Psychopomp.short_description: Guide of souls between physical and spiritual realms.
